name: com.xcodebuildmcp/XcodeBuildMCP
description: XcodeBuildMCP provides tools for Xcode project management, simulator management, and app utilities.

environment_variables.name: INCREMENTAL_BUILDS_ENABLED
environment_variables.description: Enable experimental xcodemake incremental builds (true/false or 1/0).

environment_variables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_DYNAMIC_TOOLS
environment_variables.description: Enable AI-powered dynamic tool discovery to load only relevant workflows.

environment_variables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_ENABLED_WORKFLOWS
environment_variables.description: Comma-separated list of workflows to load in Static Mode (e.g., 'simulator,device,project-discovery').

environment_variables.name: XCODEBUILDMCP_DEBUG
environment_variables.description: Enable verbose debug logging from the server.
